snippet: David Lee, Anderson Varejao and Andrea Bargnani have already hit the market. No decision has been made on Joe Johnson....
lead_paragraph: David Lee, Anderson Varejao and Andrea Bargnani have already hit the market. No decision has been made on Joe Johnson.

headline.main: NBA Buyout Deadline Has More Allure Than Trade Deadline
headline.print_headline: NBA Buyout Deadline Has More Allure Than Trade Deadline
